body:
Hey Brent,

I can't see the image but I guess you get the error that LB_Preparation has no numOfDaysEachMonth method?

If that is the case then you have an older version of Ladybug flying in your Grasshopper. Make sure the version of Ladybug_Ladybug component matches the version of sunpath. Let the 'bug fly and then try again. It should work fine.

Let me know if it wasn't the issue at all! As I said, for some reason, I can't see the image that you posted.

Mostapha
